posts.post_title: T-206 Hal Chase White Cap & Dark Cap
posts.post_content: I have For Sale (2) T-206 Hal Chases. (1) Dark Cap & (1) White Cap. Looks like they are slightly trimmed. Although they measure ok. Asking $150.00 for both Delivered. Please email me at [url]mpowers23@verizon.net[/url].  Thanks,  Marc
Price dorp to $150.00 for both Delivered.
